## About This Project

This interactive scrollytelling visualization summarizes my movie-watching journey in 2025 using my Cineville pass. It includes:

- **Hero Stats**: Total screenings, cinemas visited, cities, and hours watched
- **Cinema Analysis**: Top cinemas and an interactive map of all theaters visited
- **Movie Taste**: Genre breakdown (treemap), language distribution, and keyword cloud
- **Cinema Calendar**: Monthly activity and a detailed heatmap
- **Ratings Analysis**: Raincloud plot of rating distribution, top favorites, and least favorites
- **Guilty Pleasures & Hot Takes**: Where my ratings diverged from TMDB consensus

### Technologies Used

- **D3.js** - Data-driven visualizations
- **Scrollama** - Scroll-driven interactions
- **MapLibre GL** - Interactive cinema map
- **Tailwind CSS** - Styling
